text: Walter G. "Skip" Campbell, Jr. (November 12, 1948 – October 23, 2018) was an American Democratic politician. He was the Mayor of Coral Springs, Florida from 2014 until his death. He was a member of the Florida Senate from 1996 to 2006. Campbell was born in Queens, New York and moved to Ocala, Florida in 1961. Campbell died on October 23, 2018 in Coral Springs from complications of hip surgery at the age of 69. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Corapl Springs – Mayor Skip Campbell *Krupnick Campbell Malone Buser Slama Hancock Liberman – Walter G. title: Skip Campbell
